articles.title: This day that year: Deepti-Punam create Women's ODI history, Don Bradman hits quickfire hundred - India Today
articles.description: On this day in cricket history: India openers Deepti Sharma and Punam Raut stiched 320 for the opening wicket against Ireland to set a new world record in women's ODI cricket.
articles.content:
On May 15, 2017, Deepti Sharma and Poonam Raut set the record for the highest partnership in women's ODIs when they posted 320 for the opening stand in an ODI against Ireland in Potchefstroom, South Africa.
Deepti Sharma made 188 from 160 balls, hitting 27 b… [+1485 chars]
